title: Unplayable Lag with no ping drop - wtf
body:
So I started a ranked game, and while champ movement SEEMED ok, there was anywhere between a 1-3 second delay to do anything requiring ability usage, etc.  Animations didnt show for a few seconds, champs would jump around the screen. Minions would freeze, would walk in place, and I would be dead before I could see anyone actually on the screen.  All of this while my ping stayed at a very playable 70-80.  Never once did the ping rise to over 80 and yet the lag was unbearable.  

The friend I was premade with also had the exact same issues.  I restarted league client, and had trouble logging in, got a connection error as well.  Now, when setting up a custom game, even adding bots to the list is lagging like crazy and takes 5 seconds to actually register.  This is the first time I have had this issue and it cost me a ranked win and loss of LP.  

Speed tests and everything on my end are perfect, this is only happening with the league client. What is going on and is there a way to get a loss forgiven for that?  Its still happening hours later btw.

replies.body:
Loss forgiven is a system that is used when there are network issues on Riot's side. In this case, it sounds like you're experiencing packet loss due to a poor connection to the servers. I recommend working through [the connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to address the most common causes.

Let me know if you have any questions.
